title: La Finca Golf: Complete Property Buyer's Guide 2026
excerpt: Everything you need to know about buying property at La Finca Golf Resort in Algorfa. Developments, prices, lifestyle, and why this championship course attracts international buyers.
author: New Build Homes Costa Blanca

content.quickAnswer: La Finca Golf properties cost €195,000-550,000—35-45% less than coastal equivalents. The 18-hole championship course by Pepe Gancedo is 15 minutes from beaches, with year-round play and strong rental yields from golf tourists. Contrimar's Oasis Villas offer modern 3-bed villas with pools from €345,000.
content.intro:
La Finca Golf Resort has become one of Costa Blanca South's most sought-after addresses for golf lifestyle buyers. This championship 18-hole course in Algorfa offers something increasingly rare: quality new build properties with direct golf access at prices significantly below coastal equivalents.

Whether you're seeking a permanent golf home, a holiday retreat with fairway views, or an investment property with strong rental potential, La Finca delivers. This guide covers everything property buyers need to know about this exceptional location.

sections.title: La Finca Golf Course: 18 Holes Designed by Pepe Gancedo
sections.content:
**Course Overview:** La Finca Golf Resort in Algorfa features an 18-hole championship course designed by renowned Spanish golf architect Pepe Gancedo. Opened in 2002, the parkland-style layout stretches across rolling terrain with mature palm trees, strategic water features, and beautifully maintained greens.

The course offers 18 holes at par 72, measuring 6,027 meters from the championship tees. Wide fairways welcome players of all abilities while strategic bunkering and water hazards challenge low handicappers. The condition is consistently excellent—La Finca invests heavily in course maintenance, and it shows.

Crucially for property buyers, La Finca is playable year-round. With over 300 sunny days annually and mild winters, the golf season here never really ends. This extended playability directly impacts rental potential—golf tourists visit from October through May, not just summer.

sections.title: Location: Inland Value, Coastal Access
sections.content:
Algorfa sits approximately 15 km inland from Guardamar del Segura's beaches. This positioning is key to understanding La Finca's value proposition.

Coastal golf properties in areas like Villamartín or Campoamor command premium prices—€500,000+ for a decent villa. At La Finca, comparable properties start from €300,000-350,000. The 15-minute drive to the beach is the trade-off, and for many buyers focused on golf lifestyle, it's an easy decision.

Practical distances from La Finca:
- Guardamar beaches: 15 minutes
- Torrevieja: 20 minutes
- Zenia Boulevard shopping: 25 minutes
- Alicante Airport: 30 minutes
- Murcia Airport: 35 minutes

The inland location also means peaceful surroundings. No tourist crowds, no beach traffic—just fairways, palm trees, and Spanish sunshine.

sections.title: Current Developments at La Finca
sections.content:
Several quality builders have developed around La Finca, with Contrimar being the most prominent. Their Oasis Villas series has become synonymous with La Finca living.

**Oasis Villas 2 by Contrimar** is the current flagship development. These modern Mediterranean villas offer 3 bedrooms, private pools, and views over the golf course. Prices start from approximately €345,000 for a completed villa—exceptional value for golf-front new builds.

Contrimar has built multiple phases at La Finca over the years, establishing a strong reputation for quality construction and on-time delivery. Their experience with the location shows in thoughtful design touches: covered terraces oriented for afternoon shade, pool positioning for privacy, and layouts that maximize golf course views.

Other developments come to market periodically. The area attracts builders because demand is consistent—golf lifestyle buyers actively seek La Finca properties.

sections.title: Property Types and Prices
sections.content:
La Finca property offerings center on villas and townhouses designed for the golf lifestyle. Here's what to expect in 2026:

**Townhouses/Linked Villas: €195,000 - €280,000**
Entry-level golf living. Typically 2-3 bedrooms with shared or small private pools. Good for holiday use or rental investment with lower running costs.

**Detached Villas: €300,000 - €450,000**
The sweet spot for La Finca buyers. 3-bedroom villas with private pools, gardens, and often golf views. Modern open-plan designs with quality specifications.

**Premium Villas: €450,000 - €550,000**
Larger plots, 4+ bedrooms, enhanced specifications. Best positions on the course with unobstructed views. Often include features like infinity pools, outdoor kitchens, and premium landscaping.

Compare these to coastal golf equivalents (Villamartín, Las Ramblas): add 40-60% to each bracket. The value at La Finca is compelling.

sections.title: The Golf Community
sections.content:
La Finca has developed a genuine community feel. Residents share a common interest in golf, and this creates natural connections. The clubhouse serves as a social hub—morning coffees, post-round drinks, and regular events bring people together.

The demographic is international: British buyers historically dominated, but Scandinavians, Belgians, Dutch, and Germans are increasingly represented. Most are 50+, though younger families seeking affordable golf lifestyle are emerging.

Many residents are permanent, attracted by the combination of golf access and lower living costs than coastal areas. Others split their time between La Finca and home countries, often letting their property during absence. The community accommodates both patterns well.

sections.title: Rental Investment Potential
sections.content:
La Finca properties perform well as rentals, with characteristics that favor investors:

**Extended season**: Golf tourism runs October-May, complementing summer family demand. Occupancy potential spans 9-10 months versus 4-5 months for beach-only locations.

**Target market**: Golf holidaymakers are typically higher-spending and lower-maintenance than budget beach tourists. They treat properties well and often return year after year.

**Lower purchase price**: Entry costs 30-40% below coastal golf equivalents, improving yield calculations.

**Rental rates**: A 3-bedroom villa with pool commands €800-1,200/week in high season, €500-700/week in shoulder season. Golf groups often book for 7-14 nights.

Realistic annual gross yields of 5-7% are achievable with good marketing and management. The key is marketing to golfers specifically—general holiday portals underperform specialized golf rental platforms.

sections.title: Living at La Finca: Practical Considerations
sections.content:
**Daily essentials**: Algorfa village (5 minutes) has supermarkets, restaurants, pharmacy, and bank. For larger shopping, Guardamar and Rojales are 10-15 minutes with major supermarkets.

**Healthcare**: Hospital de Torrevieja (15 minutes) provides full services. Local health center in Algorfa handles routine care. English-speaking doctors available.

**Transport**: A car is essential. There's no avoiding this at an inland location. However, running costs are low, traffic is minimal, and parking is never an issue.

**Climate**: Slightly cooler than the coast in summer (a positive for many), similar mild winters. Morning mist occasionally delays tee times in winter but burns off quickly.

**Community fees**: Developments typically charge €50-100/month covering communal areas, gardens, and often pools. Lower than equivalent coastal developments.

**Golf membership**: Various options from pay-and-play to full membership. Annual memberships offer excellent value for frequent players.

sections.title: Buying Process at La Finca
sections.content:
Purchasing at La Finca follows standard Spanish property processes:

**New builds (e.g., Contrimar developments)**:
- Reservation fee: €6,000-10,000
- Contract signing: 30% minus reservation
- Stage payments during construction (varies by builder)
- Completion: Balance on key handover
- Bank guarantees protect stage payments

**Resales**:
- Standard 10% deposit on signing private contract
- Completion within 4-8 weeks typically
- Full searches and due diligence essential

**Costs to budget**:
- Purchase tax (ITP for resale, IVA+AJD for new): 10-12%
- Legal fees: 1-1.5%
- Notary and registry: 0.5-1%
- Total: Budget 12-14% above purchase price

We recommend using lawyers experienced with La Finca transactions—they know the developments, the builders, and any location-specific considerations.

content.conclusion:
La Finca Golf offers a compelling proposition for property buyers: championship golf on your doorstep, quality new build homes at inland prices, and a welcoming international community. The 15-minute drive to the beach is the only compromise—and for golf-focused buyers, it's barely a compromise at all.

Whether you're planning permanent relocation, seeking a holiday home with rental potential, or simply want to play golf in the Spanish sunshine, La Finca deserves serious consideration.

faqs.question: How much do properties cost at La Finca Golf?
faqs.answer: Townhouses start from €195,000, detached villas with pools from €300,000-450,000, and premium villas from €450,000-550,000. These prices are 30-40% below equivalent coastal golf properties.

faqs.question: How far is La Finca from the beach?
faqs.answer: Guardamar del Segura's beaches are 15 km away, approximately 15 minutes by car. Torrevieja beaches are about 20 minutes. The inland location is the trade-off for significantly lower property prices.

faqs.question: Who is the main developer at La Finca?
faqs.answer: Contrimar is the most prominent developer at La Finca, with their Oasis Villas series being particularly popular. They've been building at La Finca for years with a strong track record for quality and on-time delivery.

faqs.question: Is La Finca good for rental investment?
faqs.answer: Yes, La Finca performs well for rentals with an extended golf season (October-May) complementing summer demand. Realistic gross yields of 5-7% are achievable. Golf holidaymakers are typically higher-spending and treat properties well.

faqs.question: What is La Finca Golf course like?
faqs.answer: La Finca is an 18-hole, par 72 championship course designed by Pepe Gancedo. The parkland layout features wide fairways, strategic water hazards, and well-maintained greens. Green fees range from €45-72 depending on season.

faqs.question: Is a car necessary at La Finca?
faqs.answer: Yes, a car is essential. La Finca is an inland location without public transport. However, traffic is minimal, parking is never an issue, and running costs are low. The clubhouse and some facilities are walkable from most properties.

faqs.question: What other golf courses are near La Finca?
faqs.answer: Vistabella Golf (8 min), La Marquesa Golf (10 min), and Lo Romero Golf (15 min) are all nearby. The coastal courses of Villamartín, Las Ramblas, and Campoamor are 20-25 minutes away.

faqs.question: How far is La Finca from Alicante Airport?
faqs.answer: Alicante-Elche Airport is approximately 40 km from La Finca, taking around 30 minutes via the AP-7 motorway. Murcia Airport is slightly further at about 35 minutes.
